title: How to deal with this problem？
body_html:
I am practicing pytorch, other modules can be used, this can not be used. Use the command: conda install torchvision, can not be installed.

ImportError Traceback (most recent call last)
in ()
1 import torch
----> 2 import torchvision
3 import torchvision.transform as transforms
4 transform=transforms.Compose([transforms.ToTensor(),transforms.Normalize((0.5,0.5,0.5),(0.5,0.5,0.5)),])
5 trainset=torchvision.datasets.CIFAR10(root='./data',train=True,download=True,transform=transform)

ImportError: No module named torchvision
